column2: La batterie dure assez longtemps, le son est tr√®s bon, je l'ai d√©j√† fait tomber dans l'eau, la connection est toujours tr√®s rapide √† faire et, je suis s√ªr, il y a bien d'autres possibilit√©s auxquelles je me suis pas trop appliqu√©. Speaker veramente ottimo. La scatola √® ben curata e al suo interno troviamo: il jbl Flip 4, un cavo di ricarica piatto e la manualistica varia. La resa audio non √® tanto diversa dal flip 3, gi√† questo suonava bene quindi con il 4 si cade sicuramente in piedi. A differenza del flip 3, che ad alto volume distorceva leggermente il suono, il flip 4 √® perfetto fino a volume massimo, le voci vengono riprodotte in maniera chiara cos√¨ come gli strumenti in sottofondo. Bassi belli potenti fin da volume basso. L'importante paso in avanti fatto con il flip 4 √® che questo √® completamente impermeabile, dotato di certificazione ipx7 che oltre che impermeabile lo rende resistente a polvere sabbia e terra. L'autonomia dichiarata √® di 12 ore, fattibili ad un volume del 50/60 % mentre al massimo si raggiungono le 4 ore Per concludere secondo me vale tutto il prezzo che costa anche se il salto generazionale non √® cos√¨ marcato. Quelle piccole migliorie lo rendono sicuramente pi√π usabile all'aperto o in spiaggia senza preoccuparsi di dove lo si poggia o se si bagna. Se hai trovato la mia recensione interessante non dimenticare di cliccare il pulsantino UTILE, grazie.

Flip 4 that I have purchased from Amazon (Seller-e9accessarirs) on 1st July was fake and having no cripsy sound i.e. no high notes. I had returned & got refund immediately.Thanks Amazon. But finally I got the original product from Amazon (Seller-Appario Retail) and sound quality is exceptionally good with punchy bass and original vocal quality,moderate treble . It would have been much more better if treble response is like Sony XB20. Still I am very much satisfied with sound quality and battery backup.

Oltre le aspettative! Esteticamente si presenta molto bene, ha una finitura gommata e tasti solidi e ben costruiti. Molto belli i radiatori passivi ai lati che si muovono in risposta alle basse frequenze, soprattutto con volume di riproduzione medio-alto. Per quanto riguarda la resa audio, la cassa riproduce bassi potenti e decisamente soddisfacenti ma non invadenti, con una buona rappresentazione anche dei medi e degli alti. Cos√¨, a differenza di quanto avviene con alcuni competitor in questa fascia di prezzo che esasperano i bassi rendendo il suono ovattato ed impastato, qui voci e strumenti sono chiari e precisi. Le considerazioni sulla qualit√† audio della cassa tengono ovviamente conto del prezzo, delle dimensioni, e dell‚Äôautonomia che questa piccola cassa garantisce e che la rendono, a mio parere, la migliore tra le casse da circa 100‚Ç¨. Se si ricerca una cassa con un rapporto trasportabilit√†/qualit√† audio pi√π orientato sulla qualit√†, meglio guardare la JBL Xtreme2 con i suoi 4 driver ma con peso e prezzo decisamente diversi. Qualche dettaglio in pi√π: ‚Ä¢ Le dimensioni e il peso contenuto rendono la Flip 4 trasportabilissima in uno zaino o in una borsa senza occupare troppo spazio. ‚Ä¢ √à in grado di riprodurre audio stereo in quanto dotata di 2 altoparlanti da 40mm, ciascuno con una potenza di 8W, per una potenza complessiva della cassa di 16W. Sonorizza abbondantemente una stanza di medie dimensioni. Riproduce frequenze tra 70Hz ‚Äì 20kHz ‚Ä¢ Pu√≤ essere collegata tramite bluetooth 4.2 o con connettore jack da 3,5 mm. ‚Ä¢ √à possibile collegare questa cassa a qualsiasi altro modello jbl che supporti la tecnologia ‚ÄúJbl Connect +‚Äù, per un totale di 100 unit√† in riproduzione simultanea. I modelli cos√¨ collegati possono anche essere diversi, l‚Äôunica condizione √® che supportino il ‚ÄúConnect+‚Äù. Ad esempio √® possibile collegare la Flip 4 alla Jbl Extreme 2, ma non alla Flip 3, poich√© quest‚Äôultima supporta la vecchia tecnologia ‚ÄúJBL Connect‚Äù e non la ‚ÄúConnect +‚Äù. ‚Ä¢ Un'altra funzione, a mio avviso utilissima, √® la possibilit√† collegare insieme 2 casse Flip 4 e, tramite l‚Äôapp scaricabile ‚ÄúJBL Connect‚Äù, impostarle in modo che ciascuna riproduca un canale stereo. In questo modo non solo si raddoppia la potenza di riproduzione, ma si migliora significativamente la separazione dei due canali stereo, allontanando tra di loro le casse. Per utilizzare questa funzione: 1. Devono essere collegate solo 2 casse e non di pi√π 2. Le casse devono essere collegate via bluetooth ad un dispositivo con installata l‚Äôapp ‚ÄúJBL Connect‚Äù (non funziona se le casse sono collegate col jack da 3,5mm) 3. Entrambe le casse devono essere dello stesso modello, in questo caso due Flip 4. ‚Ä¢ La JBL Flip 4 ha una batteria da 3000 mAh che garantisce un‚Äôeccellente autonomia. Quella dichiarata √® di 12h. Con volume al 50% arriva oltre le 14h. Con volume al 100% dura circa 4h. Nella confezione √® presente il solo cavo di ricarica da collegare ad un qualsiasi caricabatterie usb. ‚Ä¢ La cassa certificata IPX7 non soltanto resiste agli schizzi ma pu√≤ essere immersa in acqua fino ad 1m per 30 minuti senza riportare danni. Sul sito ufficiale JBL √® scritto chiaramente che la cassa non galleggia, se messa in acqua affonda. La certificazione si riferisce all'acqua di rubinetto, se bagnata con acqua di mare o acqua clorata di una piscina, dopo l'uso √® opportuno risciacquarla per preservare le guarnizioni in gomma. Pienamente soddisfatto del prodotto, non posso che consigliarlo.

Let me first say, this is my second JBL flip 4, the one I had prior to this was an absolute BRUTE. I‚Äôm talking tough! It had been submerged under water, dropped countless times, taken to the beach, withstanded super hot summer days for hours, getting caked with mud but alas, it got ran over by a car while off-roading one day... but guess what? It STILL WORKS. Even in its smashed up state nothing broke but the speaker cover protector. So bravo JBL, this is a great product. However I bought this one for my father for his birthday, he only used it a few times in his bedroom and now it won‚Äôt turn on at all, so I tinkered with it come to find out it was a remanufactured speaker put back together incorrect without water proof rubber gaskets for the speakers, keep in mind I payed full price for a NEW speaker! Now the return windows are closed and I‚Äôm unsure who to contact to hopefully make this right...

Genau die richtige Gr√∂√üe, noch relativ leicht und handlich und f√ºr normale bis etwas lautere Lautst√§rken geeignet. Wie hier schon geschrieben wurde ist ein Rauschen zu h√∂ren, wenn man zu leise h√∂rt. Das kann ich zwar best√§tigen, aber ich empfinde das nicht als st√∂rend. Auch das Thema Delay bei der Bluetooth√ºbertragung ist zu verschmerzen und so minimal, dass man sich beim Film schauen am Pad schnell daran gew√∂hnt. Aber das ist ja immer ein subjektives Empfinden. Sicherlich hat man mit einer gr√∂√üeren Bilddiagonale am TV Ger√§t ganz andere Eindr√ºcke, weshalb die Box als Soundbar hier vielleicht doch nicht in Frage kommt. Aber f√ºr ‚Äûzwischendurch und √ºberall‚Äú funktioniert es f√ºr mich, da das Koppeln so komfortabel ist und damit jegliches Verkabeln entf√§llt. Die Reichweite der Bluetoothverbindung ist auch raum√ºbergreifend performant, d.h. keine St√∂rungen, keine Aussetzer und dies sogar durch mehrere W√§nde hindurch. Das einzige, woran man sich leider gew√∂hnen muss, ist eine relativ kurze (aber immernoch viel zu lange) laute Meldung in Form eines Gitarrenspiels, beim Ein- und Ausschalten. Leider gibt es aktuell noch keine M√∂glichkeit das bei diesem Modell mittels einer App oder eines Firmwareupdates abzustellen. Warum der Hersteller hier kein optisches Feedback √ºber die LEDs gew√§hlt hat, bleibt ein R√§tsel. Nur daf√ºr einen Punktabzug.. wenigstens k√ºndigt sich die Box nicht nochmal an, wenn sie sich nach einigen Minuten bei Leerlauf automatisch abschaltet. Also kann man auch mit H√∂rb√ºchern einschlafen...

Clear sound, great volume and bass for the size I take it with me a bit everywhere. Very good speaker. I had the FLiP3 but it got stolen and I bought this one finding that: the went from "splash proof" to "water proof", I mean, what are the odds to drop your speaker in a pool or in a bathtub full of water? How useful can it be? On the other hand they didn't modify the volume of the switching On/Off sound, which is stupidly loud. So loud that if you want to listen to some ambient music late at night you need to switch it on in another room. Not to mention that if you want to switch it off before falling asleep...it will wake up your partner!! Come on JBL ..that was a dumb move.

He probado los dos modelos, el Charge 3 y este. El Charge 3 suena fuerte y con un grave potente, m√∫sica alta y poco m√°s, sus puntos negativos, muy poco brillo en la calidad del sonido, suena muy grave y como acolchado, parece que se queda atrapado dentro, no me ha convencido por el precio que ofrece. En cambio, el Flip4 ES UNA JOYA! Sonido brillante y n√≠tido, con mucha limpieza y buena percepci√≥n en tonos y a bajo volumen, si lo encierras en una estanter√≠a suena potente y con un grave agradable. Ideal para llevarlo siempre encima por su tama√±o, adem√°s, para usar con la TV o con lo que te apetezca, es una pasada en todos los sentidos.

PROS: ‚Äì Potencia y nitidez de sonido ‚Äì JBL Connect+ (conecta hasta 100 dispositivos simult√°neamente) ‚Äì Disponible en muchos colores ‚Äì Bater√≠a de litio pol√≠mero ‚Äì Resistencia al agua IPX7 ‚Äì Bluetooth versi√≥n 4.2 CONTRAS: ‚Äì No flota ‚Äì Calidad de sonido del manos libres mejorable ACABADO/DISE√ëO El JBL FLIP 4 tiene un dise√±o cil√≠ndrico muy similar al del UE Boom 2. Este altavoz Bluetooth resistente al agua tiene unas dimensiones de 6,8 x 17,5 x 7 cm y tan solo pesa 515 gramos. Es algo m√°s peque√±o que mi JBL Charge 3 as√≠ que lo prefiero para viajar. Tiene una correa de transporte que me recuerda a una cuerda para escalar. Lo compr√© de color blanco porque a mi gusto es el que me parece m√°s minimalista. CALIDAD/PRECIO Tuve suerte y lo consegu√≠ por menos de 100‚Ç¨. Es un altavoz inal√°mbrico ideal para regalar porque est√° a un precio muy asequible. La relaci√≥n calidad precio que tiene es elevada porque si comparamos con otros altavoces de la misma gama como el Denon Mini DSB-150BT Negro - Altavoces port√°tiles (4 cm, Inal√°mbrico, Bluetooth/3.5 mm, A2DP,AVRCP,HFP,HSP, 30 m, Negro) o el UE Boom 2, los precios se disparan. CALIDAD SONIDO El JBL Flip 4 tiene dos drivers de 40mm de 8W RMS cada uno, en total 16W RMS con una frecuencia de sonido de 70 Hz a 20 KHz. La se√±al de ruido es igual o mayor a los 80 dB por lo que el sonido que genera es fuerte y rico en matices. Cabe destacar que este JBL Flip 4 no tiene calidad de sonido 360¬∫ porque sus 2 drivers est√°n orientados en la parte frontal inferior. Esto es algo que no me molesta porque el sonido que ofrece es rico en matices. Pese a su peque√±o tama√±o, este JBL suena con mucha potencia y nitidez. Los graves tienen presencia gracias a los dos radiadores pasivos que tiene en los extremos y ayudan a amplificar el bass. Los medios y las voces se transfieren sin renunciar a la calidez. CONECTIVIDAD Al ser un altavoz bluetooth, el JBL FLIP 4 tiene pocas conexiones f√≠sicas: una entrada micro-USB y un puerto mini jack 3,5mm. En cambio, la conectividad inal√°mbrica de este altavoz es excelente. Su versi√≥n bluetooth 4.2 transmite el sonido sin cortes hasta 1 0 metros de distancia. La tecnolog√≠a JBL Connect+ funciona como la tecnolog√≠a Harman Kardon connect + debido a que JBL pertenece al grupo Harman. Si no queremos utilizar el modo fiesta pero necesitamos de un sonido est√©reo real, podemos conseguirlo mediante el modo est√©reo. De esta manera, un altavoz bluetooth funcionar√° como altavoz o canal derecho mientras que el otro como el izquierdo para conseguir un sonido est√©reo real. Adem√°s, tiene un modo fiesta que nos permite conectar de manera simult√°nea hasta 100 dispositivo. El manos libres tiene cancelaci√≥n de ruido externo, pero funciona de manera mediocre. La calidad de las llamadas no es muy buena porque el sonido se escucha lejano y la otra persona llega a quejarse de la mala calidad. Es extra√±o porque JBL incluye la tecnolog√≠a de reducci√≥n de ruido y eco externo en el sistema manos libres. FUNCIONALIDAD Aunque este JBL Flip 4 no sirve como PowerBank, tiene una bater√≠a de litio pol√≠mero de 3000 mAh que ofrece hasta 12 horas de reproducci√≥n (dependiendo del volumen y la m√∫sica que reproduzcamos) y se carga en tan solo 3,5 horas. El bot√≥n para acceder al JBL Connect+ permite utilizar el altavoz en modo fiesta y conectar hasta 100 altavoces entre s√≠ para mejorar la potencia global del sonido. Este aspecto lo hace id√≥neo para fiestas como pool parties donde el espacio es m√°s amplio de lo normal y existe ruido de fondo. CONCLUSI√ìN Llevo apenas un mes utiliz√°ndolo y me encanta. Los graves se ven reforzados por los radiadores pasivos de los laterales y eso me gusta. Si lo coges en la mano puedes sentir c√≥mo vibra. Tiene una excelente relaci√≥n calidad-precio, as√≠ que es de lo mejor que podemos comprar por este precio. Me gustar√≠a que flotara en el agua, pero su resistencia IPX7 nos permite llevarlo con nosotros a la piscina o playa.

Ich habe Flip f√ºr mein Dienstfahrzeug gekauft, in dem leider kein Radio ist. Da das radio Programm in Deutschland meinen geschmack genau zu null Prozent trifft, ist ein Bluetooth Lautsprecher eh die beste wahl. Und das Ger√§t ist spitze. Er ersetzt zwar kein autoradio mit mehreren Lautsprechern, aber er schl√§gt die meisten bluetooth teile um l√§ngen. Ich h√∂re Metall und nicht klassik, da ist das letzte Qu√§ntchen Aufl√∂sung nicht von Belang. Er ist ausreichend laut und h√§lt l√§ssig 10 stunden. Kann ihn nur weiterempfehlen.

I'd been previously using Anker BT speakers but felt the need for better SQ and some weather protection whilst keeping the compact form factor. All the reviews suggested that I should go with a Ultimate Ears BOOM 2 and just when I was about to pull the trigger on one, I started reading about the lack of bass. Many reviewers compared the BOOM 2 to JBL Flip 4 saying that former has no bass and the latter has plenty of it. After watching a convincing real-life test of this on Youtube, I ordered the Flip 4. I have to say that I have never been so impressed by a BT speaker before. First of all, the red version looks extremely attractive. The size seems a bit bulky at first for a compact speaker, but I can hold it in my hands without any issues concerning grip or weight. You can even slip the speaker inside a small bag and forget it's there. The IPX7 rating is great as while I don't intend to do any water sports with the Flip 4 in hand, me and my friends do use occasionally use it in light rain or in snowy conditions. Finally, the sound. Wow. This small speaker fills up a small and medium-sized rooms with nice and crisp sound. This isn't exactly a 360-degree speaker (though it looks like one) so while you can keep it both vertically and horizontally, you do have to face it a certain way to get the SQ sweet spot. What sets this speaker apart from other similarly-sized speakers I've used is the bass. It's a small miracle that the folks at JBL have been able to get such bass into a such a small speaker as this speaker would easily fool an average listener into thinking that the music was coming from a 2.1 speaker system with a dedicated subwoofer. I guess the small trade-off concerning the excellent bass is that the passive radiators are exposed at the top and the bottom of the speaker although they are protected by the speaker exterior's edges. While these JBL speakers should be quite durable, I'd imagine they aren't as durable concerning drops and hits as the UE speakers are. I actually went and bought a protective case for the Flip 4 that protects the radiators with a mesh. The battery life is only about 12 hours but I'd rather listen to 12 hours of full sound instead of 20-30 hours of sound with only a hint of bass. So there you have it... The JBL Flip 4 is just an excellent BT speaker hitting all the marks. The competition might be more durable in terms of submerging the speaker into water or dropping it to asphalt but this type of structure does seem to set restrictions to SQ.

Can‚Äôt say enough about this speaker. I originally bought one for myself, then my parents loved it. Bought one for them a few months later. Went to the lake for a week and forgot my JBL so went and bought another one just for that week because I knew it would make the whole trip so much better. We used it every day. Got sand in it, no problem. Dunked it in the lake a few times to test the durability, nonissue. Gave it to my brother when I was done with it and he loves it too. We are now a JBL family! I even put it in a bush by the alter at an outdoor wedding that needed aisle music in a pinch and it was perfect. I love this speaker. Pairs niceley and the sound is incredible. Nothing bad to say at all. Very pleased with all three of my purchases.

No final de 2017, adquiri uma caixa de som bluetooth, modelo FLIP 4, e recebi √≥timas recomenda√ß√µes da JBL, sendo uma das empresas refer√™ncia na √°rea de fabrica√ß√£o deste produto. Em doze meses de uso, tudo ocorreu muito bem, sem nenhum problema. A surpresa veio quando o produto completou 1 ano e 1 m√™s de uso, ou seja, saiu da garantia da f√°brica. A caixinha de som simplesmente deixou de marcar a contagem correta da bateria, ou seja, existem 5 pontinhos de luz que te guiam sobre o tempo de carga restante, e esses pontinhos simplesmente ficaram inst√°veis. Se s√≥ existe 1 pontinho aceso e voc√™ liga a caixinha na tomada, todos os pontinhos voltam a acender como se a bateria j√° tivesse carregado. Por mais que voc√™ deixe o aparelho carregando a noite inteira, nos primeiros 30 minutos de uso, ela simplesmente desliga. Como o problema foi repentino, procurei casos semelhantes na internet e fiquei COMPLETAMENTE SURPRESO. Se qualquer consumidor buscar no Google o seguinte problema "JBL FLIP 4 com bateria viciada depois de 11 meses", vai encontrar milhares de reclama√ß√£o com os mesmos fatos. Ou a JBL tem um problema t√©cnico em todos os seus equipamentos desta linha, ou h√° uma "obsolesc√™ncia programada", ou seja, seu equipamento vai parar de funcionar em 11/12 meses. Isso est√° acontecendo com milhares de consumidores que, inclusive, j√° registraram a reclama√ß√£o aqui. Ap√≥s verificar as respostas que a empresa deu, orientado que o consumidor procurasse a assist√™ncia t√©cnica, decidir ligar no local e verificar o procedimento que a empresa estava adotando neste caso que afetou milhares de consumidores logo ap√≥s a garantia de f√°brica acabar. Para minha surpresa, fui informado que se a garantia acabou n√£o h√° nada a ser feito, e mesmo se eu quiser obter uma nova bateria, que sai por mais de metade do custo de uma nova JBL, h√° uma fila de consumidores aguardando. Ou seja, o problema √© t√£o grave e recorrente, que nem a assist√™ncia t√©cnica da pr√≥pria empresa tem o equipamento para repor, ainda que o consumidor decida pagar do pr√≥prio bolso. Todos os meus amigos e parentes perguntam sobre a qualidade da JBL, e agora eu realmente tenho o que dizer. JBL NUNCA MAIS. VERGONHA. ABUSO.

--} I have been using these JBL Tune 120TWS Truly Wireless in-Ear Headphones for a week now and am sharing my experience. --} You get earphones, charging case, micro USB cable and a User Guide in the box. The design of the earbuds is such that it fits securely in the ears. Earbuds won't fall during exercising, running, etc. I mainly use these during my work-out sessions and not once have these earbuds accidentally pop out of my ears. The look of the earbuds is elegant. In ears, these doesn't look absurd or over-sized. A total of 6 color options are available for the earbuds and charging case. --} Before commenting on the sound quality of these earphones, I want you to know that selecting the correct size of earbuds is VERY IMPORTANT before using any in-ear earphones. Whatever be the brand / price of the earphones, if the size of the earbuds is not proper, there is no point of discussion of the capability of the earphones' sound quality and hence, I suggest you to choose the proper fitting earbuds before using the earphones. A total of 3 pairs of earbuds are provided by JBL for choosing the perfect fit for your ears. --} Now, coming to the sound quality, The EXPERIENCE that you get while listening to music, interviews, audio books, watching movies, etc. is REALLY VERY GOOD. The bass is deep and punchy, the CLARITY of the dialogues / voices is VERY GOOD and the overall sound coming from the earphones is REALLY GREAT. --} All in all, for its price, these JBL earphones (like other JBLs) sounds great and you won't be disappointed!. For the call quality, it is great. The person on the other side can hear you clearly, without any noise or disturbances. --} Earbuds are light in weight and won't stress out your ears even with a long usage. Each earbud has a Blue / White LED Light which shows whether the earbud is in pairing mode, paired, etc. Both the earbuds have a button on them, which can be used to perform various functions like playing / pausing music, activating Google Assistant / Siri, muting a call, etc. You can find these functions listed in the User Guide provided by JBL. The right earbud is the master earbud and can be singly used too! --} Coming to its battery life, earbuds provides a 3-4 hours of audio playback. These can quick charge in 15 minutes and provide an hour of playback. The charging case of these earbuds looks classy and enhances the playback time by 10-12 hours. The case has 3 LEDs for showing the charging levels and a micro USB slot for charging (covered by a rubber slot). These earphones are not waterproof, so you cannot use these while swimming or during rain. --} JBL is a renowned and trustworthy brand in the audio industry. I don't think there will be any issue with the built quality of these earphones in the coming months. JBL provides a 1 Year Warranty for these earphones. --} To conclude, I REALLY like these JBL Tune 120TWS Truly Wireless in-Ear Headphones. They have GREAT sound quality and a steady fit in the ears. The earbuds and its charging case looks really classy. I recommend buying these truly wireless earphones! --} Thanks a lot for reading my review. I have attached a video review also, in which I have shown the earbuds, charging case, earbuds fitting, etc. Please comment down any questions/feedback you have regarding the product or my review. I will answer them as soon as possible.

I was expecting good things from these ear buds, especially from a respected brand like JBL, but unfortunately I have a good few niggles. Firstly the instructions are somewhat confusing, but connected fine. The sound is pretty good, with exceptionally good bass. You have to change volume from your device which is a bit annoying - you can't do from the buds. Using controls (pause/next etc) takes a bit of getting used to. My really big niggle with these is that it is impossible to power them off when they are in the case. The instructions imply that as soon as you place them back in the case, and close the lid, they turn off. They don't! You can manually turn off whilst out of the case, but as soon as you put them back in the case, they power on again. If you manually power off with them in the case, they immediately power on again. Pretty rubbish really. Maybe this is a defective item, I can't believe this is how they are meant to be. Sadly, can't really recommend these. Battery life is fine UPDATE: I have found that actually the ear buds DO turn off once returned to the case, but there is a lapse of time before they do, but they do after a while. I would now recommend these for consideration, notwithstanding the other (relatively minor) niggles above

Fit and comfort: The earbuds did come out after a while, it fits nicely but my ears are quite small so it did fee quite big even with the smallest size. It was very comfortable to wear and did feel quite loose but it was nicely secure. Sound: The bass was good, these earbuds gave me the punchy bass that i wanted and sound isolation was good. As i put them in the sound around me drowned. They dont have noise cancellation but it seems like they do. The call quality was very good aswell. Downside: They dont have a volume button so when i want to make it louder i would have to get my phone out. When i went shopping i wouldn't be able to hear myself or the cashiers voice so i would have to take them out but it is a good thing because the seal is good. My overall thoughts: These were much cheaper because of the sale but they are worth the price. They are very good and sound quality was perfect and i would not even go back to airpods, i get that the Airpod pros have newer features but these earbuds give me what i want

Tengo muchos auriculares. Bose, Apple, Sehnheiser, Senso, JBL... y quer√≠a estos por lo sencillo de su dise√±o, pero es justo su dise√±o y modo de uso lo que compromete su sonido. El nivel de su volumen es m√°s bien bajo y las frecuencias que aporta, esto es, su rendimiento en bajos-medios-agudos cambia de la noche al d√≠a seg√∫n te los aprietas y esta es la clave del problema. No son malos, pero no son buenos tampoco. Cualquier marca china a cambio de 50 o 60 euros puede ofrecerte un rendimiento similar. JBL es, o al menos era, una gran marca y por querer ofrecer un producto competidor de los AirPods de Apple pero a mitad de precio cae justo donde caen los de Apple: su no aislamiento. Al no aislarse tienes dos problemas: uno, la posici√≥n y postura de uso, que depender√° un poco en la forma de tus orejas permitir√° que te los acerques mejor o peor a tu pabell√≥n auditivo. La forma de mi oreja no ayuda demasiado. Si me los aprieto el sonido pega un cambio radical, mejora mucho y se aleja del sonido a lata que consigo si los dejo en su posici√≥n natural. Por otra parte al no ser aislantes el problema se incrementa, no porque dejes de o√≠r los ruidos de la calle, tr√°fico, gente hablando, sino porque al aislarse creas una c√°mara anecoica dentro de tus o√≠dos y que se forma desde el aislante y hacia dentro, con lo que concentras ese sonido mejor y m√°s pegado a ti. Al ser "abiertos" son c√≥modos, pero como haya mucho jaleo a tu alrededor su nivel puede ser incluso bajo para escuchar m√∫sica y voces. ir con ellos por la calle, haciendo ejercicio, o incluso estando en casa con las manos apret√°ndotelos es inviable, as√≠ que te los comes tal y como son. Les pasa otra cosa raruna: son algo perezosos a la hora de activarse y sincronizarse con mi iPhone. Los sacas de la caja, reducida y bien acabada pero algo inc√≥moda por tener una sujeci√≥n por im√°n algo excesiva, te los pones, y tardan... 10 o 12 segundos en sincronizarse. Si te llaman por tel√©fono y los sacas para responder, la situaci√≥n se puede convertir en confusa. Te los pones y suenan una serie de sonidos de activaci√≥n, luego de sincron√≠a, mientras que con la otra oreja, la izquierda, respondes al aparato, para que todo se quede en silencio un par de segundos, y empieces a escuchar por el oido derecho que es el "master" del duo. Se oye el tel√©fono por los dos, pero el izquierda es esclavo de derecho. Sin el derecho activado no haces nada. No son malos, pero tiene estos peros. No se si voy a devolverlos, sospecho que no, pero sin el aislante sus prestaciones se disipan mucho. Para andar por casa, escuchar podcast, bien, para escuchar m√∫sica peor, para ir con ellos por la calle... flojos. A mi entender, por sonido, comodidad, equilibrio calidad-precio, de largo los mejores que he usado son los Bose. El problema es que duran muy poco, est√°n fabricados con materiales y t√©cnicas que acaban fallando r√°pido.

I was very sceptical about these as to be honest they are cheap compared to others. Always nice to be proved wrong for good reasons. The sound quality is incredible, i rate these better than my Bose and they cost a lot more. People rate the noise cancellation of Sony as the best, you guys need to try these, they are better. This was proved on the Gadget Show I'm told. As an on ear set they are lovely to wear and cause no discomfort or pressure. My favourite have always been Sennheiser, not cancelling ones but the best sound and to wear. There is now a new champ on the head and they have 5 stars in all three boxes. I'm buying another pair before they realise their mistake and double the price.

My primary objective was to use this device to attend calls as i travel a lot in bus and train. This one is strange, it will add as much noise as possible to already chaotic environment. There are people who asked if I'm at sea shore while I was in bus. Next i was at home attending another call in hot summer evening the people on other side started asking if I'm celebrating diwali. The moment some air from fan touches the headset it creates noise as if it is molested. Another funny observation is it behaves little better if it is connected by wire... Overall this can only be used if you want to dance in silence listening to music. If your going to make a call with this your making big mistake. Very irritating headset which neither covers fully nor leaves it open. It like having foreplay and no climax. After one month the stupid thing died after ranting. Then called customer care waited for 30 minutes to get connected to someone alive. He said send it their main service center in Gurgaon. Then endless calls, mails and follow ups only thing I get is "15 working days"... I believe that's there motto... It is not their turn around time but that's the days product will work properly after that it is of no use.... Everyday one genius will attend the call... One fellow talks like India üáÆüá≥ population is 100 crore and so lakhs product to his service center for repair.... As if their product cheap like govt provided condoms and every tom Dick and harry has 100s of their product... He believes they are selling condoms and failure of it resulted population growth.... Another just learned one sentence of English in his whole life... "please wait for 15 working days".. So much for international brand with zero service. For all those miserable people who wants to buy this be aware that it is made China and not done any QA QC. It is not checked in India as opening it is not allowed. So your luck plays major role in getting good product. They don't have international warranty as well... Amazon also gives damn about you after 10 days. Purely buy if you want waste time with harmaN and jbl...

Good - sound quality, bass, noise control, ease of operating buttons, head band Bad - NO app to manage the device, single device can be connected at a time, does not connect automatically in iOS, customised audio jack not easily available in market

Was disappointed with the Sound quality when Noise Canceling is On, there is a background white noise produced by headphones when there is no music or on some silent/quite parts of the song. Replaced them with the seller for new pair and new pair had same issue... Unfortunately ether I have two bad pair or it is what it is. When I compared to other headphones my colleges had at work defiantly there is a lot of room to improve for JBL in terms of connectivity and noise canceling. Without NC they work fine, but it is pointless...

I saw these on the gadget show, where they got a good review against some serious competition and I had been thinking about getting a set for travelling to drown out the noise of engines, children etc. The noise cancelling isn't total, but it is more than good enough for my needs. The bluetooth works fine with my phone, but a wired connection is provided, which should extend battery life. I haven't tried that yet. All in all, very pleased with my purchase.

Bought these after seeing a review on the Gadget show. Maybe I was expecting a bit much after the tests they performed but I wasn't impressed with the noise cancelling. sound is ok, although not as good as the AKG headphones I had previously. Bought these because I thought the noise cancelling would help when on train commuting and whilst it reduces the noise a little I'm not convinced this isn't just the padding on the earpads doing this. When you turn off noise cancelling it seems to generate a hissing noise in order to show you that noise cancelling is off! I've tried turning noise cancelling off in a silent room and the phones jus generate a noise and if you turn noise cancelling on then it goes quiet (as you would expect in a silent room!). Having said all that I got these whilst on offer for about ¬£50 so still giving them 3 stars - had I paid the retail price of ¬£90 I would be sending these back.

The quality is the best you could on this price range (and even other more expensive ones that I've tried). It's a reliable all-rounder and the sound is good enough. When connected with the lead and NC is on, the quality goes up by 20 percent. I definitely recommend it.

Bought these when the price was ¬£44 and for those money the product meets and at times exceeds my expectations. Few months forward and I notice the price has experienced a spike to ~¬£80 which I consider to be unacceptable. For ¬£80 I expect more comfortable ear pads and a braided AUX-cable. JBL has other good headphones, and, moreover, Sony's all-around models in that price range are a better bargain. [Original review: you are looking for a budget headset that will last you a while, but mistrust Taotronics because of the notorious reputation Chinese products have, then you will be happy with these earphones. The sound is clear, the bass is not invasive, battery life is decent, although sometimes bluetooth connectivity is slow for some odd reason (easily pairs with my MacbookPro 2015 and Huawei Mate 10 lite). Only two major complaints are the foam and the glossy exterior of the earcups - the foam isn't as soft, so it is a potential nuisance for users with sensitive ears; and the glossy exterior is prone to wear and scratching, which could be avoided with a D-brand sticker. Packaging, presentation, user experience is top-notch. My second JBL product and looking forward to buying my next one. Cheers!]

-Sound quality is mediocre. I brought these headphones to block out, outside noises from the neighbours as well as listen to music at home, they are a smaller size than most and very comfortable to wear, the noise cancelling is very good, I can stand next to the tumble dryer and cant hear it with music playing through the headphones. sound quality is as good as a more expensive pair that we have.

Decent fit. Does fit tightly around head. Wearing spectacles is a problem as it pushes hard on ear. Noise cancellation is okay, nothing worth demoing. Sound quality is good. Bluetooth range is spectacular.

I love these headphones, I take them everywhere with me. The battery lasts almost all day which is great because I use them almost all day. They charge up pretty quickly too. Love the noise quality. Have not used the battery up yet from initial charge but seems to be holding up well. Noise cancelling option sends good but not fully tested. That's the only reason for no rating sorry.

Initialement pr√©vu pour √©couter la TV le soir sans d√©ranger les enfants, ma femme et moi en avons achet√© chacun un. La qualit√© sonore est tr√®s bonne et il a su trouver sa place au quotidien pour √©couter de la musique via Amazon Prime Music, il fait aussi bien que des casques Bose, Sony, Beats etc... Par contre pour ce prix, ne cherchez pas une att√©nuation des bruits comme sur le Bose QuietComfort 35 II ou le Sony WH-1000xM3, nous sommes clairement pas dans la m√™me gamme. Mais le JBL LIVE 650BTNC ne s'en sort pas si mal et att√©nue tr√®s fortement les bruits ambiants (ma femme fait beaucoup de p√¢tisserie dans notre cuisine ouverte avec des appareils bruyants et gr√¢ce √† ce casque je peux √©couter la TV sans √™tre d√©rang√©). La fonction vocal Alexa fonctionne tr√®s bien et l'application JBL permet de g√©rer les assistants vocaux Amazon/Google comme nous le voulons. Que dire de plus... C'est un tr√®s bon casque milieu de gamme qui fait aussi bien que des hauts de gamme. JBL | Harman/Kardon ne sais pas tromp√© sur ce produit, c'est un tr√®s bon rapport qualit√©-prix.

Apr√®s de nombreuses lectures de tests de casque, je me suis d√©cid√© pour celui ci. Premi√®re impression √† la r√©ception : le casque respire la fiabilit√©. J'ai donc pu utiliser le casque en condition "r√©elle" : TER, TGV, ville, campagne. La r√©duction de bruit est efficace lorsque je ne bouge pas. Cependant, lorsque je me balade, tourne la t√™te, ... le casque bouge et donc la r√©duction du bruit ne se fait plus correctement. Est-ce d√ª aux lunettes ? Est-ce d√ª au r√©glage trop "souple" et qui ne garde pas assez les coussins coll√©s aux oreilles ? J'ai fait tester le casque √† certains de mes coll√®gues et eux n'ont pas eu ce souci. Ce casque est tr√®s bon mais ne me convient pas. Il va falloir que je me tourne vers un autre mod√®le.

ergonomie : les drivers appuis l√©g√®rement sur les oreilles (coussinets pas assez √©pais) , douleur au dessus du cran due a l‚Äôarceau . "si utiliser longtemps" audio : distorsions et manques de d√©tails dans les m√©diums. r√©duction du bruit : un focal wireless lisen fait aussi bien en passif bref retour a l'envoyeur^^

Tout simplement g√©nial. Je l utilise beaucoup dans le bus en heure de pointe et vraiment impressionnant la r√©duction de bruit. M√™me juste allum√© sans son. Avec la musique (pas forte) je n entends quasiment plus le bus ni les gens qui parlent autour. Par contre faire attention car on n entends une voiture arriv√© que lorsqu'elle est tr√®s proche.. fait tr√®s bien son travail de r√©duction de bruit et la qualit√© du son n'est que meilleure sans √™tre forte.

Commande arriv√©e tr√®s rapidement (2 jours avant la date pr√©vue). En revanche j'avais command√© un casque bleu, c'est un blanc qui a √©t√© livr√© (et je n'ai envie de me lancer dans une d√©marche de retour d'article). Bonne connection par bluetooth avec mes appareils, confort correct (il ne faut pas avoir de trop grandes oreilles). La r√©duction de bruit est correcte : masque compl√®tement certains bruits graves mais pas compl√®tement la TV par exemple. Il est n√©cessaire d'utiliser l'application My JBL Headphones pour avoir acc√®s √† l'√©galiseur, cette appli n'est pas dans le microsoft store, et n'est pas non plus compatible avec des t√©l√©phones non r√©cents (5 ans pour le mien). Acc√®s facile aux touches du casque (son, avance ou recul d'une piste audio). J'imagine que certains casques sont plus performant mais une centaine d'euros en plus.

Qualit√© sonore au top. Casque avec des basses bien prononc√©es et le reste du spectre est juste ultra clair avec une bonne spatialisation du son et des d√©tails plus que correct,. Niveau confort √ßa sert un peu au d√©but mais avec le temps on s'y habitue et les coussinets reste moelleux, je l'utilise pour mes s√©ances de footing c'est parfait. Dernier point r√©duction de bruit active qui est plut√¥t mauvaise j'avais achet√© un casque chinois en dessous de 100‚Ç¨ qui avait une r√©duction active un cran au dessus. Bref, pour ce prix je ne pense pas trouv√© mieux son plus gros atout est le son et c'est ce que je cherchais sur un casque.

Le casque a fonctionn√© deux semaines avant que l'oreille gauche ne fonctionne plus. Globalement, la r√©duction de bruit est plut√¥t efficace. Par contre, pour la qualit√© du son, ne vous attendez √† rien d'exceptionnel. C'est tr√®s standard. Vous paierez pour le bluetooth, la r√©duction de bruit et le design, pas pour la qualit√© du son. Le point positif de ce casque est la possibilit√© d'activer la r√©duction de bruit active sans le bluetooth, c'est √† dire en branchant le cable sur son t√©l√©phone.

Ce produit m'as presque totalement satisfait : le qualit√© sonore est pr√©sent√©, le confort est extra et la r√©duction de bruit se sent vraiment dans les transports. Seul probl√®me, le casque s'est mis √† gr√©siller quand le casque a √©t√© mouvement√© (√ßa n'est arriv√© que rarement)

Day 1: Headphones came, sounds great, google assistant works great Day 10: Battery backup reduces even after without noise cancellation activated Day 12: The bass sounds distorted (but I build the tolerance) Day 15: Headphones misbehaving, Automatically turns on and gets connected to the nearest paired device Day 16: Headphones stops charging Don't know what to do next

I wanted so much to like the headphones, however, they are let down in a number of areas, which mens they only get 3 stars and will be going back to Amazon later this week. As a standard pair of bluetooth headphones, they perform adequately well. The sound is good, not as good as I'd have liked, but not bad. Construction is good. A bit too plasticy maybe, and the buttons are rather tricky to find when wearing them, but over all OK. I am a size 58 head, and the headphones grip quite hard so I think if I was wearing them for a few hours, like on a plane journey, I'd struggle with them. Alas, the good points end there. Now the not so good. Pairing with both my android phone and Amazon tablet took a lot of time and retries. Eventually I managed to pair them, but in order to pair to the tablet, I have to turn off bluetooth on the phone first. They will not pair to a different device if an existing one isn't active. Not had that happen with other equipment. The headphones are meant to work with both Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa (Have to choose one from the Android app (Alas, no Amazon app, so no way to do so from an Amazon tablet unless side loading). OK(ish) so far. The following is mostly about Alexa as I use that more than Google Assistant. Again, just like the pairing, it was a bit of a faff getting the headphones and Alexa to pair. Once paired, it seems to work for a little while, but then somehow either the headphones or the Alexa app stop communicating and everytime you brush the left earpiece you get a screeching "You have no connection, Either connect to the devise or restart the Assistant application" or something similar. In other words, you've lost the assistant completely. In order to get it back, have to shut down/restart earphones and/or Alexa. A few times....... Noise Cancelling. Given this is the major feature for these headphones, I was very very disappointed. I have up to new used a set of Bose QC15s, which are nearing the end of their life, hence looking for replacement ANCs. The Bose headphones, despite being at least 6 years old cut out all humming and noise. I have used them on noisy trains, planes, boats, etc. They work and the background noise is, despite them being ON ear only just brilliant. I was expecting at least same, if not better from the JBL set, given they are new, hence I expected newer technology. Alas, I am really disappointed. The ANC is really the worst feature of the headphones. I tested then in the car and they hardly cut out the engine noise at all. Bose ones did 100% almost. This evening, I did a test with all my headsets, some on ear, some over. Only the Bose and the JBL are ANCs. I had a SF program on, which had lots of background noise (Starship engine hum, etc). Result: Bose: 100% cut out of background noise. JBL: Some loss of background noise, but hardly any difference if ANC on or off. Other headphones: Performed about as well as JBL, despite no ANC. OK, not a scientific test, I grant you, but as good a test as I need to know they aren't up to spec. So, in conclusion, I have to surmise that on a plane/train/etc, these JBL headphones will be practically useless in terms of ANC, thus making them totally pointless. Alas, I tried to hard to like them... So, going back to Amazon later this week and I'll now consider sticking to Bose and just biting the bullet and spending a lot more money. Not recommended as main features don't work.

Lets try: 1) sound quality is pretty good. Don't fiddle with app equilizer. Default is fine. Voice in any video or song comes out awesome. Bass is good, not earth quake like. 2) and is okay. Meaning is cuts out noise alright, but fails with high pitch sounds. For example if some lunetic plays heavy metal in full volume in gym, you will hear it. 3) comfort is superb. 4) lags water resistance. 5) price is perfect. 6) style takes rest f the positive points. A sure shot head turner.
I bought these after buying an extreme 2 but these just don‚Äôt live up to the same quality. The volume is just not loud enough and the bass option causes distortion.

Great !! hear the sound and you will fall in love with these pair of HP... the ANC technology works perfect . great bass control. Download the app on your mobile and turn on the BASS, JAZZ or according to your choice. The Alexa works perfect!!

The sound quality on these is very precise and balanced across the range. Using the app you can tweak the sound balance using their graphic equalizer - useful for me, because it was set up too bass heavy for my taste. They are comfortable, light and fit over my ears (and my ears are not small). Bluetooth connected very easily and is very stable. Charging is easy and quick - I've only done it once so far and I've clocked up about 15 hours wireless use. I connected to Alexa. This was very easy to do, but you do need to download an app. Once connected it was very easy to use - so easy that I found it difficult because I was looking for something more complicated. These headphones can be used to answer calls, but if you are looking for headphones that do this well and often, I'd look elsewhere for more specialised headphones. I've seen comments about sporting activities and these headphones, which surprised me. These are clearly not designed for sporting activities. Walking around? Yes. Sitting in your armchair with your feet up? Definitely. Going for a 5k jog? Probably better off getting some sports headphones.

Komfortabel sind die Kopfh√∂rer auf jeden Fall. Nach einem Tag testen konnte ich sie aber ohne weiteres √úberlegen zur√ºcksenden. Basslastiger lieder sind f√ºr diesen kopfh√∂rer nichts. Man h√∂rt es "klackern" und bei sehr Treblelastigen liedern kann es auch vorkommen, dass der Kopfh√∂rer nicht das leistet, was man von anderen kopfh√∂rern dieser preisklasse gewohnt ist. I've just upgraded from a broken pair of Sony wired over ear headphones out of necessity. Initially i was amazed by the quality of the audio. I'm finding more and more that i should have got these a long time ago so i didn't always listen to music up loud on my older headphones when i on planes and trains etc.

Only gave 3 stars due to me having to return them Upon opening the box,it was well packaged with the usual cables and cloth storage bag. Headset seemed well built and sturdy and the sound was very good but I had to return them due to the Bluetooth kept disconnecting They had mostly full charge and I tried disconnecting and connecting again but same problem Haven't had this issue with previous headset (KS Immerse)

Really nice headphones, first time I have tried JBL/Harman but I shouldn't have worried, especially given their pedigree. I am into bass-heavy songs so usually go for deep bass headphones, usually the Sony Extra Bass series. However what you find with those headphones is that the bass is very muddy. Not so with this JBL Live 650BTNC. The lows, mids and highs are handled wonderfully. The sound is also very loud, so you will not need to listen at full volume to enjoy your music fully. The negatives? The button controls are not very intuitive, so you have to take extra care to press buttons, or know which button you are actually pressing! Also, although you have bluetooth multipoint, and so 2 devices can be connected simultaneously, you will find the next time you switch the headphones on, you are only connected to the last device you connected to. So you have to manually connect the 2nd device. Which is pants really.

Vorweg kann ich f√ºr alle die sich die ganze Rezension nicht antun wollen schon mal sagen, dass ich von den JBL Tune500 Bluetooth Kopfh√∂rern begeistert bin. Ich hab mir nat√ºrlich kein Klangwunder erwartet, f√ºr den Preis. Ich war dann aber nicht schlecht √ºberrascht als ich den Kopfh√∂rer aufgesetzt hab. Er ist sehr laut. Es fehlt ihnen vielleicht manchmal ein wenig an Mittelt√∂nen, aber bei gestreamter Musik aus dem Smartphone ist das wirklich nicht wichtig und man muss schon sehr genau hinh√∂ren. Ich bin begeistert vom Klang der kompakten Dinger. Ein Mikrofon ist nat√ºrlich auch eingebaut. Somit kann man nat√ºrlich auch Telefonate annehmen und √ºber die Kopfh√∂rer telefonieren. Man klingt nat√ºrlich immer etwas weiter weg, aber das liegt wie bei allen Headsets daran, dass das Mikrofon eben neben dem Ohr ist und nicht in der N√§he des Mundes. Der Kopfh√∂rer verf√ºgt auch √ºber eine Taste mit dem man den pers√∂nlichen Assistenten aufwecken kann. In meinem Fall Siri. Ja, funktioniert nat√ºrlich auch ohne Probleme. *Fazit* Ich bin begeistert. F√ºr den Preis einen so guten Klang hinzubekommen ist schon eine Leistung. Partiamo col dire che non √® una cuffia per audiofili, forse anche a causa della tecnologia Bluetooth non pu√≤ vantare molti dettagli, e l'equalizzazione enfatizza notevolmente i bassi (io l'ho equalizzata togliendo 2 dB sulla banda dei 63 Hz ed 1 dB sulla banda dei 125 Hz). Non √® facile equalizzarla, perch√© diminuendo i bassi non restituisce maggiori dettagli come le cuffie pi√π dotate, piuttosto li va perdendo, quindi non modificate oltre i 125 Hz; e se il suono vi sembra troppo caldo/musicale sappiate che √® stata progettata cos√¨ (musicale = Beyerdynamic, dettagliata = Sennheiser). Detto questo la scena sonora √® sufficientemente ampia, la resa sonora √® come detto musicale (suono caldo), la separazione ed il posizionamento degli strumenti √® deludente e non rende bene una scena sonora troppo ricca, l'amplificazione √® eccellente (non dipende dalla sorgente!), non sono presenti rumori statici degni di nota, la batteria dura a lungo ed il segnale Bluetooth √® molto solido; √® anche piuttosto comoda ed esteticamente gradevole. I materiali sono appena discreti, chiaramente migliorando questi si poteva migliorare l'eccessiva risonanza sui bassi ma sarebbe triplicato il suo prezzo. Si ricarica in poco tempo. In questa fascia di prezzo non si pu√≤ pretendere di pi√π, anzi √® gi√† un mezzo miracolo, regge il confronto con cuffie ben pi√π costose. Sarebbe un bene se JBL ne sviluppasse una variante migliorata sulla fascia dei 70/80 euro, ma non so se la tecnologia Bluetooth sarebbe sufficientemente matura per consentirle un salto di qualit√†. Comoda ed in sostanza suona bene. Promossa.

Die Kopfh√∂rer halten sogar Laufeinlagen (kurzer Sprint zur S-Bahn und Bus) stand und rutschen nicht einen Zentimeter. Bedienung Die "√úblichen Verd√§chtigen" Steuerungselemente f√ºr das Skipping, sowie die Lautst√§rkeregulierung lassen sich mit etwas √úbung gut intuitiv erreichen und regaieren schnell und ohne zeitliche Verz√∂gerungen. JBL hat gl√ºcklicherweise von Touch und Gestensteruungen Absand genommen nd gibt hier robuste und ertastbare Regler als Werkzeug zur Hand. Die Steuerungselemente sind Prima; auch im Hinblick auf die Ambient Aware & TalkThru Technologie des LIVE500BT. Hier gen√ºgt ein leichter Andruck auf das JBL Logo der Lauscher und schon reguliert sich der Kopfh√∂rer soweit herunter um beispielsweise den Stra√üenverkehr wahrnehmen zu k√∂nnen oder via TalkThru um sich bei aufgesetztem Kopfh√∂re mit seinen Mitmenschen austauschen zu k√∂nnen. Hierf√ºr reichte mir bis dato eigentlch den Kopfh√∂rer einmal kurz herunter nehmen, aber bitte man ist ja lernf√§hig...;-) Technik des JBL Live 500BT Over-Ear Kopfh√∂rer Die trockenen Fakten zum JBL 500 BT sehen folgenderma√üen aus: Bauart: geschlossener OverEar Kopfh√∂rer Bluetooth: 4.2 Bluetooth Profile: A2DP V1.3, AVRCP V1.5, HFP V1.6, HSP V1.2 Treiber: 50mm Impedanz (OHM): 32,0 Treiberempfindlichkeit 108dB SPL@1kHz/Pa Akku: Lithium-ion polymer (3.7V, 700mAh) Akkulaufzeiten (laut Hersteller): 32 Stunden Features: Ambient Aware & TalkThru Technologie, kompatibel mit Alexa und Google Assistant Klangeigenschaften/Sounding: Die JBL Kopfh√∂rer bieten f√ºr die Preisklasse einen f√ºr meinen pers√∂nlichen Geschmack wirklich ordentlichen Klang ohne dass, hierbei wirklicher Referenzcharakter aufgewiesen wird. Der Kopfh√∂rer ist klanglich eher Mitten- und Tiefenlastig. Dies ist kein Makel, sondern funktioniert in Gewissen Genren (die ich auch bevorzuge) sehr gut. Rock. Hardrock und Metall sowie HipHop darf man sich hier getrost und auch mit recht viel Spielfreude zu Gem√ºte f√ºhren, jedoch bleiben hier klanglich die H√∂hen etwas auf der Strecke. Die H√∂hen muss man hier schon suchen und gerade unter Vollast bieten diese klanglich f√ºr mich keinen besonderen Mehrwert. Klar, der Kopfh√∂rer ist ein mobiler Begleiter und man sollte die Anspr√ºche nicht so hoch schrauben wie beispielsweise an Monitorkopfh√∂rer o. √§.. Wer beispielsweise Gitarrensolis mag, Vocals oder gar Klassik bevorzugt wird hier aber nach meinem Daf√ºrhalten etwas vermissen und sollte sich vor dem Kauf vielleicht erstmal alternativ "einh√∂ren". Noch ein abschlie√üendes Wort zur Ger√§uschreduzierung: Die passive Ger√§uschreduzierung des Kopfh√∂rers finde ich extrem gut geraten, denn bei einfachem aufsetzen der Kopfh√∂rer wird man schon sehr gut von den akustischen Einfl√ºssen um sich herum "abgekabselt". Was wiederum bei Bedarf einfach und gut durch die Ambient Aware & TalkThru Funktionen reguliert werden kann. Hier n√§mlich bietet JBL ein f√ºr meine Begriffe wirklich "gro√ües Tennis" an und ich w√ºrde mir seitens der Konkurenzen am Markt hier wesentlich mehr "Nachahmer" w√ºnschen. In Abspielpasuen ist √ºbrigens ein leichtes Grundrauschen zu vernehmen, welches ich aber keinesfalls als st√∂rend empfinde. Mein Fazit: Der Live 500 BT ist ein technisch Klasse ausgefeilter mobiler Kopfh√∂rer f√ºr die eher lauten und rockigen T√∂ne. Die Akkuleistung, die Bluetoothnutzung sowie die Ambient Aware & TalkThru Technologie bieten hier einen echten Mehrwert. Etwas zu stark empfinde ich pers√∂nlich den Seitenandruck auf den Ohren, gerade bei stundenlanger Nutzung und f√ºr Menschen mit etwas √ºber der Norm gro√üen K√∂pfen. In Summe von mir ordentliche und verdiente 4 Sterne..

I spent several weeks looking for a good 'all round' pair of noise cancelling headphones - read many reviews, watched a significant number of online video reviews, and then decided on these JBL LIVE 500BT Wireless Over-Ear Headphones. These are substantial headphones - they're well made, the cups are soft BUT they are incredibly tight (I don't have a big or wide head) and after 15 minutes use at a time, couldn't wait to get them off. Pairing these was relatively simple, download the JBL Headphone App was straightforward, as was setting the Equaliser setting, but try as I might to get the firmware to update - impossible. The sound is good but not great - it's got excellent mid range tones but I found that when listening to LBC, the speech sounded clear but almost too base heavy no matter what setting I chose in the App. The volume is excellent but there's a very strange and extremely irritating issue when walking outside - if there's any breeze, you get really irritating noise feedback no matter what setting you use, so renders these headphones horrible to use for anything that involves outside exercise. As for the controls - they are OK but no great - could not get Alexa or Siri to work - in fact, the App doesn't offer a Siri option so I have no idea IF these headphones interact with that. Speaking to a friend when out walking, I asked how I sounded to them - they said 'tinny and a little muffled' - not great, so then called back a couple of friends using the Apple Earpods and they said the voice was far clearer. I am sure that these headphones are perfectly OK for indoor or use on a train or aeroplane BUT for a general purpose pair, they are a huge disappointment and I cannot recommend, so returning them for a refund.

... ein ABER. Ich habe den Prime Day genutzt und nach einer einw√∂chigen Forschung nach vern√ºnftigen OverEar H√∂rern diese doch noch relativ g√ºnstig ‚Äûgeschossen‚Äú !!! Und nun dann im Einzelnen: Verpackung: Macht einen durchweg hochwertigen Eindruck und es entsteht erst einmal das Gef√ºhl, dass die Verpackung geliefert wurde, aber die Kopfh√∂rer noch im Versand liegen! Nach eing√§ngiger Suche nach einer Lupe kann man sich dann die Funktionsweise erlesen! Lieber Hersteller: DAS geht gar nicht!!!! Gr√∂√üe/Gewicht Wie es bei OverEar eben ist, sind diese H√∂rer ein wenig gr√∂√üer, dieses aber eben nur wegen der Muscheln. Ich habe nirgendwo eine wirkliche Gr√∂√üenangabe gefunden und mir deshalb eine viel zu gro√üe Aufbewahrungstasche geordert (naja gehen eben noch ein paar ander Haushaltsdinge hinein..). Also habe mal gemessen und normal sind die Ma√üe bei 20x17x8 cm, aber geklappt (beide Muscheln nach innen!) liegt das Ma√ü dann bei 17x15x8 cm und wenn die Muscheln √ºbereinander stehen sogar bei nur noch 17x13x8 cm. Sie sind sehr leicht auf dem Kopf und werden nur der geschlossenen Bauweise geschuldet etwas warm an den Ohren ohne dass es wirklich sehr unangenehm wird. Habe den H√∂rer nach dem aufladen jetzt mal 2,5 Stunden am St√ºck getragen und das OHNE Probleme. Und links spielt dann ALEXA und Google Voice irgendwie und rechts kann man dann ausser als AN/AUS denselben Knopf auch noch f√ºr SIRI verwenden - ich GLAUBE, dass das besser geht!!! Vor/Zur√ºck geht auch noch, aber da kommt man auch noch mit Laut/Leise ins Gehege. Und obwohl ich die ‚ÄûTalkThru‚Äú und ‚ÄûAmbientAware‚Äú f√ºr eine recht sinnvolle Geschichte erachte, die anderen Herstellern ein Beispiel sein sollte, ist auch hier die Knopf- Findung nicht wirklich ausgereift. Und nun beginnt der Lernprozess‚Ä¶.. welches K√∂pfchen nehme ich denn nun schnell‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. viel Spa√ü‚Ä¶.. Was noch eine Erw√§hnung wert ist, ist eine problemlose Verbindung und die Reichweite, sowie die Verbindungssicherheit, meine damit, dass es in meiner knapp vierst√ºndigen Testphase erst einmal bei ca. 10 Metern zu Knacksern, nicht aber vollendetem Abriss kam. Nur ein Probeanruf und der war v√∂llig in Ordnung, nicht ‚Äûhigh quality‚Äú aber zur Verst√§ndigung v√∂llig ausreichend. DAS !!! wie immer, das wichtigste halt fast zum Schluss! Der Klang/Sound! Ich halte diese H√∂rer f√ºr recht ausgereift, sofern nicht auf Orchester oder gar ganze klassische Konzerte abgestellt wird. Es ist nun mal, selbst mit der EQ-Nullstellung, KEIN linearer H√∂rer. Mir gef√§llt die Breite der H√∂rer aber trotzdem, da von einem guten Bass, √ºber wohlklingende Mitten bis dann nicht so spitzen, allerdings immer pr√§senten und stimmigen, H√∂hen alles vorhanden ist und gut bis sehr gut klingt. Zudem kann mit JBLApp und EQ auch immer noch ein wenig ‚Äûgefeit‚Äú werden um die pers√∂nlichen Befindlichkeiten zu befrieden. Ich habe mich sofort gut aufgehoben gef√ºhlt und das, obwohl ich noch ein Vertreter des Einspielens von H√∂rern und Lautsprechern bin! Diese klangen aber von Beginn an sehr vern√ºnftig und ich erwarte mit der Zeit auch noch ein wenig ‚ÄûZuwachs‚Äú. Ich habe jetzt viel Material geh√∂rt, von Metallica √ºber Dire Straits √ºber solche Titel wie ‚ÄûCalifornia Dreamin‚Äô von The Mamas and The Papas‚Äú, wie auch von SIA, aber auch SASH (h√∂rt mal ‚ÄûCELESTE‚Äú!), Common Linnets oder Faithless. Aber genauso fein klingen aus meiner Sicht auch nicht so vordergr√ºndig bassbetonte St√ºcke, also St√ºcke mit normalen Percussions, wie z.B. VANGELIS ‚ÄûI‚Äôll find my way home‚Äú oder Jean Michel Jarre. Es z√§hlt ja aber das Gesamtpaket und mit der Bedienungsanleitung und g√§nzlich ohne irgendwelchen Schutz f√ºr ein 150 ‚Ç¨ - Ger√§t m√ºssten hier ein bis zwei Sternchen dran glauben. Werden nun noch die (aus meiner Sicht) nicht sehr g√ºnstig positionierten Kn√∂pfe zusammen mit der Bedienung zu Grunde gelegt, w√§ren es auf alle F√§lle zwei Punkte Gesamtabzug. Ich werfe dann noch die f√ºr mich gute Tragweite in die Waagschale und die ‚ÄûNeuheit‚Äú des ‚ÄûTalkThru‚Äú und ‚ÄûAmbientAware‚Äú, sowie die gute und stabile Verbindung! Obwohl nun kein Langzeittest m√∂glich ist, sieht der H√∂rer zudem auch recht stabil und haltbar aus und die Zeit wird uns ein Ergebnis zeigen. Letztlich w√§ren wir damit dann bei wohl recht guten 4 Sternchen und ganz ehrlich, mit T√§schchen/Beutel und halbwegs lupenfrei lesbarer Bedienung w√§ren es wohl doch schon (wenn auch knappe) ‚Äû5‚Äú geworden‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. Meine Empfehlung hat dieser H√∂rer auf alle F√§lle und ist einen Versuch bei Wunsch nach qualitativ hochwertigen und gutklingenden Kopfh√∂rern wert. Ho acquistato queste cuffie da Amazon Warehouse, e ne sono rimasto davvero soddisfatto? Le ho utlizzate per piu di un mese per poi mandarle indietro poiche il pulsante di pause aveva smesso totalmente di funzioare. Ora, posso dire che queste cuffie funzionano bene e hanno una durata della batteria ottima, ma parliamo di qualit√† del suono. Non parliamo di un suono pessimo, anzi. Ma abbiamo un suono che supera secondo me la media per questo prezzo. Diciamo, per√≤, che hanno un audio moooolto basso e dei alti un po' poco chiari. I bassi sono decenti, ma non cosi tanto ( il modello 450BT che costa circa 1/4 di queste ha dei bassi spaventosi a confronto ) E quindi questo, consiglio queste cuffie a chi non ha molte aspettative, altrimenti consiglio altro.
It's not the best phone in the world but JBL does a good job with the sound quality and comfort while running and exercising with the headphone. It's a good purchase. Happy with it.
Excellent headphones, ambient aware is an brilliant feature great for out on the road. Fit comfortably and snug. Overall very happy with them.

Apr√®s de nombreuses lectures de tests de casque, je me suis d√©cid√© pour celui ci. Premi√®re impression √† la r√©ception : le casque respire la fiabilit√©. J'ai donc pu utiliser le casque en condition "r√©elle" : TER, TGV, ville, campagne. La r√©duction de bruit est efficace lorsque je ne bouge pas. Cependant, lorsque je me balade, tourne la t√™te, ... le casque bouge et donc la r√©duction du bruit ne se fait plus correctement. Est-ce d√ª aux lunettes ? ergonomie : les drivers appuis l√©g√®rement sur les oreilles (coussinets pas assez √©pais) , douleur au dessus du cran due a l‚Äôarceau . Tout simplement g√©nial. Je l utilise beaucoup dans le bus en heure de pointe et vraiment impressionnant la r√©duction de bruit. M√™me juste allum√© sans son. Bonne connection par bluetooth avec mes appareils, confort correct (il ne faut pas avoir de trop grandes oreilles). La r√©duction de bruit est correcte : masque compl√®tement certains bruits graves mais pas compl√®tement la TV par exemple. Il est n√©cessaire d'utiliser l'application My JBL Headphones pour avoir acc√®s √† l'√©galiseur, cette appli n'est pas dans le microsoft store, et n'est pas non plus compatible avec des t√©l√©phones non r√©cents (5 ans pour le mien). Acc√®s facile aux touches du casque (son, avance ou recul d'une piste audio). J'imagine que certains casques sont plus performant mais une centaine d'euros en plus.

Qualit√© sonore au top. Casque avec des basses bien prononc√©es et le reste du spectre est juste ultra clair avec une bonne spatialisation du son et des d√©tails plus que correct,. Niveau confort √ßa sert un peu au d√©but mais avec le temps on s'y habitue et les coussinets reste moelleux, je l'utilise pour mes s√©ances de footing c'est parfait. Dernier point r√©duction de bruit active qui est plut√¥t mauvaise j'avais achet√© un casque chinois en dessous de 100‚Ç¨ qui avait une r√©duction active un cran au dessus. Bref, pour ce prix je ne pense pas trouv√© mieux son plus gros atout est le son et c'est ce que je cherchais sur un casque.

Le casque a fonctionn√© deux semaines avant que l'oreille gauche ne fonctionne plus. Globalement, la r√©duction de bruit est plut√¥t efficace. Par contre, pour la qualit√© du son, ne vous attendez √† rien d'exceptionnel. C'est tr√®s standard. Vous paierez pour le bluetooth, la r√©duction de bruit et le design, pas pour la qualit√© du son. Le point positif de ce casque est la possibilit√© d'activer la r√©duction de bruit active sans le bluetooth, c'est √† dire en branchant le cable sur son t√©l√©phone.

Ce produit m'as presque totalement satisfait : le qualit√© sonore est pr√©sent√©, le confort est extra et la r√©duction de bruit se sent vraiment dans les transports. Seul probl√®me, le casque s'est mis √† gr√©siller quand le casque a √©t√© mouvement√© (√ßa n'est arriv√© que rarement)

Day 1: Headphones came, sounds great, google assistant works great Day 10: Battery backup reduces even after without noise cancellation activated Day 12: The bass sounds distorted (but I build the tolerance) Day 15: Headphones misbehaving, Automatically turns on and gets connected to the nearest paired device Day 16: Headphones stops charging Don't know what to do next

I wanted so much to like the headphones, however, they are let down in a number of areas, which mens they only get 3 stars and will be going back to Amazon later this week. As a standard pair of bluetooth headphones, they perform adequately well. The sound is good, not as good as I'd have liked, but not bad. Construction is good. A bit too plasticy maybe, and the buttons are rather tricky to find when wearing them, but over all OK. I am a size 58 head, and the headphones grip quite hard so I think if I was wearing them for a few hours, like on a plane journey, I'd struggle with them. Alas, the good points end there. Now the not so good. Pairing with both my android phone and Amazon tablet took a lot of time and retries. Eventually I managed to pair them, but in order to pair to the tablet, I have to turn off bluetooth on the phone first. They will not pair to a different device if an existing one isn't active. Not had that happen with other equipment. The headphones are meant to work with both Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa (Have to choose one from the Android app (Alas, no Amazon app, so no way to do so from an Amazon tablet unless side loading). OK(ish) so far. The following is mostly about Alexa as I use that more than Google Assistant. Again, just like the pairing, it was a bit of a faff getting the headphones and Alexa to pair. Once paired, it seems to work for a little while, but then somehow either the headphones or the Alexa app stop communicating and everytime you brush the left earpiece you get a screeching "You have no connection, Either connect to the devise or restart the Assistant application" or something similar. In other words, you've lost the assistant completely. In order to get it back, have to shut down/restart earphones and/or Alexa. A few times....... Noise Cancelling. Given this is the major feature for these headphones, I was very very disappointed. I have up to new used a set of Bose QC15s, which are nearing the end of their life, hence looking for replacement ANCs. The Bose headphones, despite being at least 6 years old cut out all humming and noise. I have used them on noisy trains, planes, boats, etc. They work and the background noise is, despite them being ON ear only just brilliant. I was expecting at least same, if not better from the JBL set, given they are new, hence I expected newer technology. Alas, I am really disappointed. The ANC is really the worst feature of the headphones. I tested then in the car and they hardly cut out the engine noise at all. Bose ones did 100% almost. This evening, I did a test with all my headsets, some on ear, some over. Only the Bose and the JBL are ANCs. I had a SF program on, which had lots of background noise (Starship engine hum, etc). Result: Bose: 100% cut out of background noise. JBL: Some loss of background noise, but hardly any difference if ANC on or off. Other headphones: Performed about as well as JBL, despite no ANC. OK, not a scientific test, I grant you, but as good a test as I need to know they aren't up to spec. So, in conclusion, I have to surmise that on a plane/train/etc, these JBL headphones will be practically useless in terms of ANC, thus making them totally pointless. Alas, I tried to hard to like them... So, going back to Amazon later this week and I'll now consider sticking to Bose and just biting the bullet and spending a lot more money. Not recommended as main features don't work.

Lets try: 1) sound quality is pretty good. Don't fiddle with app equilizer. Default is fine. Voice in any video or song comes out awesome. Bass is good, not earth quake like. 2) and is okay. Meaning is cuts out noise alright, but fails with high pitch sounds. For example if some lunetic plays heavy metal in full volume in gym, you will hear it. 3) comfort is superb. 4) lags water resistance. 5) price is perfect. 6) style takes rest f the positive points. A sure shot head turner.
I bought these after buying an extreme 2 but these just don‚Äôt live up to the same quality. The volume is just not loud enough and the bass option causes distortion.

Great !! hear the sound and you will fall in love with these pair of HP... the ANC technology works perfect . great bass control. Download the app on your mobile and turn on the BASS, JAZZ or according to your choice. The Alexa works perfect!!

The sound quality on these is very precise and balanced across the range. Using the app you can tweak the sound balance using their graphic equalizer - useful for me, because it was set up too bass heavy for my taste. They are comfortable, light and fit over my ears (and my ears are not small). Bluetooth connected very easily and is very stable. Charging is easy and quick - I've only done it once so far and I've clocked up about 15 hours wireless use. I connected to Alexa. This was very easy to do, but you do need to download an app. Once connected it was very easy to use - so easy that I found it difficult because I was looking for something more complicated. These headphones can be used to answer calls, but if you are looking for headphones that do this well and often, I'd look elsewhere for more specialised headphones. I've seen comments about sporting activities and these headphones, which surprised me. These are clearly not designed for sporting activities. Walking around? Yes. Sitting in your armchair with your feet up? Definitely. Going for a 5k jog? Probably better off getting some sports headphones.

Komfortabel sind die Kopfh√∂rer auf jeden Fall. Nach einem Tag testen konnte ich sie aber ohne weiteres √úberlegen zur√ºcksenden. Basslastiger lieder sind f√ºr diesen kopfh√∂rer nichts. Man h√∂rt es "klackern" und bei sehr Treblelastigen liedern kann es auch vorkommen, dass der Kopfh√∂rer nicht das leistet, was man von anderen kopfh√∂rern dieser preisklasse gewohnt ist. Die Lautst√§rke l√§sst sich gut regeln, f√ºr mich aber ist es komisch, dass die kopfh√∂rer im vergleich relativ leise sind. Finde ich schade. Das Design ist gut gelungen. I've just upgraded from a broken pair of Sony wired over ear headphones out of necessity. Initially i was amazed by the quality of the audio. I'm finding more and more that i should have got these a long time ago so i didn't always listen to music up loud on my older headphones when i on planes and trains etc.

Only gave 3 stars due to me having to return them Upon opening the box,it was well packaged with the usual cables and cloth storage bag. Headset seemed well built and sturdy and the sound was very good but I had to return them due to the Bluetooth kept disconnecting They had mostly full charge and I tried disconnecting and connecting again but same problem Haven't had this issue with previous headset (KS Immerse)

Really nice headphones, first time I have tried JBL/Harman but I shouldn't have worried, especially given their pedigree. I am into bass-heavy songs so usually go for deep bass headphones, usually the Sony Extra Bass series. However what you find with those headphones is that the bass is very muddy. Not so with this JBL Live 650BTNC. The lows, mids and highs are handled wonderfully. The sound is also very loud, so you will not need to listen at full volume to enjoy your music fully. The negatives? The button controls are not very intuitive, so you have to take extra care to press buttons, or know which button you are actually pressing! Also, although you have bluetooth multipoint, and so 2 devices can be connected simultaneously, you will find the next time you switch the headphones on, you are only connected to the last device you connected to. So you have to manually connect the 2nd device. Which is pants really.

Just received the headphones. Just one problem the instructions provided with them are impossible to read. The print is far too small and I cannot read them even with my glasses. You would think having paid ¬£160 for the headphones they would provide readable documentation with them. This is appalling - Unless I can find the instructions online I will be returning them. Fortunately the company were able to provide an online version of the instructions which meant I was able to read the guidelines.

Do una valutazione temporanea di 4 stelle in attesa di aumentarla (o diminuirla, spero di no...) dopo averla provata per un po', solo per dare un'indicazione a chi come me volesse collegare la cuffia a W10. This product was extremely disappointed and though I was very excited to receive these and they didn‚Äôt live up at all to my expectations. Wow these suck for the money! Replacing a set of 5 year old Philips on ear ones only because I dropped them and the frame cracked.
